name: VR Speed for Google Cardboard Virtual Reality
name_original: VR Speed for Google Cardboard Virtual Reality
description:
An addicting speed simulator game in first person 3D virtual reality for Google Cardboard and other mobile virtual reality headsets.

Press the Cardboard trigger or any button on your gamepad to start the game! Tilt your head in the direction you want to move. The further you get, the difficulty gets increased. You will encounter moving and spiked blocks once you get further into the game.


Compare your high score with your friends, see who is the ultimate virtual reality VR blocks player.


COMPATIBLE VR HEADSETS
Google Cardboard
Stooksy
Durovis Dive
Refugio 3D
VRTX One
ANTVR
VR Smartview
ColorCross
VRTRIA
